name: UIDocumentBrowserViewController
desc: A view controller for browsing and performing actions on documents that you store locally and in the cloud.

items.name: init(forOpening: [UTType]?)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a document browser view controller that can open the specified file types.

items.name: var delegate: UIDocumentBrowserViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The document browser's delegate.

items.name: protocol UIDocumentBrowserViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: The protocol you implement to respond as the user interacts with the document browser.

items.name: func importDocument(at: URL, nextToDocumentAt: URL, mode: UIDocumentBrowserViewController.ImportMode, completionHandler: (URL?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Imports a document into the same location as an existing document.

items.name: var allowsDocumentCreation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the document browser can create new documents.

items.name: var allowsPickingMultipleItems: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the user can select and open more than one document at a time.

items.name: func revealDocument(at: URL, importIfNeeded: Bool, completion: ((URL?, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Reveals, and optionally imports, the document at the provided URL.

items.name: var contentTypesForRecentDocuments: [UTType]
items.desc: Content types for browsing recent documents.

items.name: var browserUserInterfaceStyle: UIDocumentBrowserViewController.BrowserUserInterfaceStyle
items.desc: The visual style for the document browser.

items.name: enum UIDocumentBrowserViewController.BrowserUserInterfaceStyle
items.desc: Styles that define the document browser's appearance.

items.name: var additionalLeadingNavigationBarButtonItems: [UIBarButtonItem]
items.desc: Additional bar button items that the document browser displays on the leading side of its navigation bar.

items.name: var additionalTrailingNavigationBarButtonItems: [UIBarButtonItem]
items.desc: Additional bar button items that the document browser displays on the trailing side of its navigation bar.

items.name: var shouldShowFileExtensions: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the browser always shows file extensions.

items.name: var localizedCreateDocumentActionTitle: String
items.desc: The title for the Create Document button.

items.name: var defaultDocumentAspectRatio: CGFloat
items.desc: The aspect ratio for the Create Document button.

items.name: var customActions: [UIDocumentBrowserAction]
items.desc: Custom document browser actions.

items.name: class UIDocumentBrowserAction
items.desc: A custom action that you can create and add to a document browser's Edit menu or navigation bar.

items.name: func transitionController(forDocumentAt: URL) -> UIDocumentBrowserTransitionController
items.desc: Creates a transition controller that provides the standard system-loading and segue animations for the document browser.

items.name: class UIDocumentBrowserTransitionController
items.desc: An object that implements the standard loading and transition animations for a document browser.

items.name: struct UIDocumentBrowserError
items.desc: A structure that contains information about document browser errors.

items.name: enum UIDocumentBrowserError.Code
items.desc: The error codes for document browser errors.

items.name: let UIDocumentBrowserErrorDomain: String
items.desc: The error domain for document browser errors.
